enhanced_by.reason: The 'attr' method is used to get the attribute value, which is necessary to verify the presence of the attribute before removal.
The 'hasAttr' method checks if the attribute exists, which is crucial for verifying the state before attempting to remove it.
The 'attr' method can be used to verify that the attribute has been successfully removed after calling 'removeAttr'.
The 'hasAttr' method can be used to assert that the attribute no longer exists after the removal operation.
